author: kfogel
msg: Fix bug reported by Lars Kellogg-Stedman <lars@larsshack.org>, using
his suggested fix.  It never got an issue number, but here's his
I tried performing the following operation: "svn mv src/config.h.in ."
But src/config.h.in wasn't in the repository.  This should have
generated an error, right around line 141 in libsvn_wc/copy.c.  But
case of unversioned resource.  Also, add braces for readability.
this file tests both cp and mv.
